what is the size of the hitbox?
21 pixels by 11 pixels, if you‚Äôre referring to this game
So basically the height of the kid, and the width goes from the tip of the front foot to the middle of the back foot
Yeah, you always move at a constant of 3 pixels per frame
it's arithmetic modulo 3 basically
So when you touch a wall you only move 1 or 2 pixels, which means that changes the group of 3 pixels you walk on, which means the closest you can be to a spike is either 0, 1, or 2 pixels
Depending if which group of pixels you‚Äôre walking on
@sethdash you only move 1 or 2 pixels sometimes
but yea the bottom line is
if you're on x=0 then you can only move to x=3
Ngl, something i have a feeling ill never understand how is works is v-aligns LUL
*it works
valigns aren't complicated, they're just a bit quirky to work with
